name: 7.8 "Jumping Jerks" Multiple Choice Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 7 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Why did Rebecca say Cheers couldn't have a happy hour?
questions.correct: Not legal in the state of Massachusetts
options: The bar was in the wrong location for it
No one would come to it
Not legal in the state of Massachusetts
They tried it once and it didn't work
questions.explanation:
Not legal in the state of Massachusetts.

	Rebecca had put out a suggestion box and Sam was reading some of the suggestions. None of the suggestions worked. Massachusetts was one of the first states to ban happy hour.

questions.text: What movie did Woody, Norm and Cliff always watch?
questions.explanation:
The Magnificent Seven.

	"The Magnificent Seven" was an older movie starting Yul Brynner. The guys watched it whenever it was on TV, as a tradition.

questions.text: Who was the man who taught skydiving?
questions.explanation:
Bob.

	Bob was played by J. Kenneth Campbell. He has been on Broadway, TV and film.

questions.text: Did the three guys jump out of the plane the first time up?
questions.explanation:
no.

	They chickened out and made up a lie. The lie was "We jumped, the parachutes opened, we landed."

questions.text: How did Carla spell the word "hell"?
options: H E double upside down candy canes
questions.explanation:
H E Double hockey sticks.

	This was fitting for Carla since she was a big time hockey fan. She was asking Woody if they really jumped because she knew Woody didn't like to lie.

questions.text: Who went with the three guys the second time?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	Sam thought the story the guys told about jumping was exciting. He decided he wanted to try it as well. At first the other men didn't want to go, but Woody decided to go so that he wouldn't be telling a lie any longer. The other two went as well, afraid Woody might say something about them not jumping the last time.

questions.text: Did the men jump the second time they went?
questions.explanation:
no.

	Once again they chickened out. Sam was upset that they lied about jumping before and decided he wasn't jumping.

questions.text: Did they jump the third time up?
questions.explanation:
yes.

	Woody was the first to jump because he couldn't live with the lie any longer. Sam then yelled down. "Hey Woody, is it scary?" and then he jumped. Norm jumped right after Sam. Cliff didn't want to jump so they made it seem like the plane ran out of gas and was going down. Cliff said, "Not with me, you're not" and jumped out of the plane as well.

questions.text: What did Rebecca have the men do when they jumped out of the plane?
options: Form the letter C for Cheers with their bodies
Nothing, she was against them skydiving
questions.explanation:
Hold a banner that said "Cheers".

	Sam and Norm held the sign. It was shown on TV, making great publicity for the bar.

questions.text: Who did Rebecca go out with at the end of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Bob.

	Sam asked why she was taking Bob out when Bob didn't jump out of the plane. Rebecca said that Bob didn't "blow chunks" when he jumped out of the plane either.
